column4: meskarune: grub's boot sector should go in the mbr if it gors anywhere at all. Not to any Partition Boot Record.
will the security releases be auto installed as well?

There is basically no difference between "sudo aptidue install foo" and "sudo apt-get install foo" anymore (and in the past the main difference was knowing what was automatically installed vs manually installed so that when you *removed* a package you had an easier time clearing out the cruft it depended on as well).
